article_title: Clock Runs On Money For Obamacare's Medicaid Expansion

article_metadata.description: President Obama is traveling the country trying to coax the remaining 19 states, largely led by Republican governors, into taking advantage of the Affordable Care Act’s generous federal funding formula that costs state coffers much less than in the past to provide Medicaid coverage. Obama last week visited Louisiana’s new governor, [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
